everyone. &nbsp;I can help teachers develop&nbsp;best practices for implementing them so that students persevere longer towards finding the solution.</p></div></div><div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \"><div class=\"wpb_wrapper\"><h5><img src=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Teachers_64px2.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"69\" height=\"64\" data-jpibfi-post-excerpt=\"\" data-jpibfi-post-url=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/\" data-jpibfi-post-title=\"Home\"> <span style=\"color: #2d58a1;\">Teacher Questioning</span></h5><p>I have trained thousands of educators&nbsp;on how to quickly and effectively <a href=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/questioning-skills/\" target=\"_blank\">modify their questioning</a> by using a role-playing activity which&nbsp;simulates classroom pressures. &nbsp;This activity results in teachers finding it&nbsp;easier to&nbsp;formatively assess students in real time and foster richer classroom conversations.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class=\"vc_empty_space\" style=\"height: 10px\"><span class=\"vc_empty_space_inner\"></span></div><div class=\"ult-spacer spacer-58fabb5cebf4e\" data-id=\"58fabb5cebf4e\" data-height=\"15\" data-height-mobile=\"15\" data-height-tab=\"\" data-height-tab-portrait=\"\" data-height-mobile-landscape=\"\" style=\"clear:both;display:block;\"></div></div></div></div></div><div class=\"vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid dt-default\" style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;\"><div class=\"wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12\"><div class=\"vc_column-inner \"><div class=\"wpb_wrapper\"><div class=\"dt-fancy-separator title-left h4-size style-double\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><div class=\"dt-fancy-title\" style=\"color: #4fad26;\"><span class=\"separator-holder separator-left\"></span>What People Are Saying<span class=\"separator-holder separator-right\"></span></div></div><div class=\"ult-spacer spacer-58fabb5ced333\" data-id=\"58fabb5ced333\" data-height=\"10\" data-height-mobile=\"10\" data-height-tab=\"10\" data-height-tab-portrait=\"\" data-height-mobile-landscape=\"\" style=\"clear:both;display:block;\"></div><section class=\"testimonial-item testimonial-item-slider\"><div class=\"ts-wrap contentSlider-wrap ts-autoHeight ts-ready\"><div class=\"ts-viewport\" style=\"width: 705px; height: 260px;\"><ul class=\"testimonials slider-content ts-cont psWithBullets\" data-autoslide=\"9000\" style=\"transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); visibility: visible;\"><li class=\"ts-slide ts-loaded\" style=\"left: 0px;\"><article><div class=\"testimonial-content\"><div class=\"pf-content jpibfi_container\"><input class=\"jpibfi\" type=\"hidden\"><p>Robert was a dynamic trainer who presented information in an unassuming, learner-centered way, allowing teacher participants to think about their own teaching and apply the new strategies accordingly. Throughout the two days, Robert modeled sound instructional strategies as he explained the why, the what, and the how of implementing this approach to math instruction. He provided research-based excerpts, short videos, and data figures to support the approach in a way that was clear and thought-provoking to the teacher participants.</p></div></div><div class=\"testimonial-vcard\"><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/MaumeeLetterofReference.pdf\" class=\"rollover this-ready\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"alignleft\"><img class=\"preload-me\" src=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/PhpFuu0XVthumb-60x60.jpg\" srcset=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/PhpFuu0XVthumb-60x60.jpg 60w, http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/PhpFuu0XVthumb-120x120.jpg 120w\" width=\"60\" height=\"60\" title=\"PhpFuu0XVthumb\" alt=\"\"></span><i></i></a></div><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/MaumeeLetterofReference.pdf\" class=\"text-primary\" target=\"_blank\"><span>Maumee Valley Country Day School<br>Toledo, OH</span></a><br></div></div>\n</article></li><li class=\"ts-slide ts-loaded\" style=\"left: 705px;\"><article><div class=\"testimonial-content\"><div class=\"pf-content jpibfi_container\"><input class=\"jpibfi\" type=\"hidden\"><p>Mr. Kaplinskyâ€™s presentation style is exceptional; he is able to break down the complex work of Depth of Knowledge and Problem Based Learning into something practical and tangible that teachers can take back and use the next day in their classrooms.</p></div></div><div class=\"testimonial-vcard\"><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/hillsboro.pdf\" class=\"rollover this-ready\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"alignleft\"><img class=\"preload-me\" src=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/f6adf7e19f7d6fd61537ee0e70725ed0_400x400-300x300-60x60.png\" srcset=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/f6adf7e19f7d6fd61537ee0e70725ed0_400x400-300x300-60x60.png 60w, http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/f6adf7e19f7d6fd61537ee0e70725ed0_400x400-300x300-120x120.png 120w\" width=\"60\" height=\"60\" title=\"f6adf7e19f7d6fd61537ee0e70725ed0_400x400-300Ã—300\" alt=\"\"></span><i></i></a></div><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/hillsboro.pdf\" class=\"text-primary\" target=\"_blank\"><span>Hillsboro School District<br>Hillsboro, OR</span></a><br></div></div>\n</article></li><li class=\"ts-slide ts-loaded\" style=\"left: 1410px;\"><article><div class=\"testimonial-content\"><div class=\"pf-content jpibfi_container\"><input class=\"jpibfi\" type=\"hidden\"><p>Robert successfully convinced the room of teachers and leaders that problem-based learning was not only engaging for students, but an essential piece of math learning. He changed the mindset of many from focusing all classroom time on procedural fluency, to providing a balance of procedural fluency, conceptual understand, and critical thinking in mathematics.</p><p>During our training three teachers in separate conversations shared, â€œThis is the best professional development I have ever attended.â€ And many more shared similar sentiments after the training day.</p></div></div><div class=\"testimonial-vcard\"><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/webster_groves.pdf\" class=\"rollover this-ready\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"alignleft\"><img class=\"preload-me\" src=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/wgsd-1-300x300-60x60.png\" srcset=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/wgsd-1-300x300-60x60.png 60w, http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/wgsd-1-300x300-120x120.png 120w\" width=\"60\" height=\"60\" title=\"wgsd-1-300Ã—300\" alt=\"\"></span><i></i></a></div><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/webster_groves.pdf\" class=\"text-primary\" target=\"_blank\"><span>Webster Groves School District<br>Webster Groves, MO</span></a><br></div></div>\n</article></li><li class=\"ts-slide ts-loaded\" style=\"left: 2115px;\"><article><div class=\"testimonial-content\"><div class=\"pf-content jpibfi_container\"><input class=\"jpibfi\" type=\"hidden\"><p>During his presentation, Robert provided guidance for overcoming every problem/task-based implementation impediment thrown his way, while simultaneously sharing classroom/coaching tools and modeling exemplary practice.  Participants were engaged from start to finish, and left with plenty of resources and fuel for change agency.  Robert Kaplinsky should be at the top of every mathematics leaderâ€™s resource list.</p></div></div><div class=\"testimonial-vcard\"><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/letter_gadoe.pdf\" class=\"rollover this-ready\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"alignleft\"><img class=\"preload-me\" src=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/DOE-Seal-Logo-2-300x300-60x60.png\" srcset=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/DOE-Seal-Logo-2-300x300-60x60.png 60w, http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/DOE-Seal-Logo-2-300x300-120x120.png 120w\" width=\"60\" height=\"60\" title=\"DOE-Seal-Logo-2-300Ã—300\" alt=\"\"></span><i></i></a></div><div class=\"wf-td\"><a href=\"http://robertkaplinsky.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/letter_gadoe.pdf\" class=\"text-primary\" target=\"_blank\"><span>Georgia Department of Education<br>Macon, GA</span></a><br></div></div>\n</article></li></ul><div class=\"leftArrow disabled\"></div><div class=\"rightArrow\"></div></div><div class=\"psNav psBullets\"><div class=\"psBullet act\"></div><div class=\"psBullet\"></div><div class=\"psBullet\"></div><div class=\"psBullet\"></div></div></div>\n</section><div class=\"vc_empty_space\" style=\"height: 30px\"><span class=\"vc_empty_space_inner\"></span></div><div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \"><div class=\"wpb_wrapper\"><p style=\"text-align: center;\">Want to read more?
